overview: A one-way trip going, another one coming back. A head injury. A donkey. Sheep. The church. A stew. The belfry. Candles. The wind blowing. Dawn. The confusion. The cobbled streets. Solitary steps. Birds that fly. Unmatched mirrors. Where can we find a true image on this night that is falling?
title: El Canto de los Estorninos
